content:
I'd be happy to help you organize your calendar. Please provide me with the details of the baby-related events you need to keep track of, such as:

* Due dates (including the expected birth dates and the names of the expecting mothers)
* Birthdays (including the dates and names of the babies)
* Any other related events, such as baby showers, baptisms, or first-year milestones

You can share the information in any format you have it - a list, a spreadsheet, or even just a bunch of notes. I'll help you organize it into a clear and easy-to-read calendar.

Once I have the information, I can assist you in:

* Creating a calendar that includes all the important dates
* Setting reminders and notifications for each event
* Providing you with a schedule that you can refer to and update as needed

Let's get started!
